body:
Try running `kubectl edit ingress` and adding an ingress object, or an empty list, then exit the editor – it will panic like this:

```
panic: runtime error: index out of range

goroutine 1 [running]:
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd/util/editor.(*EditOptions).Run.func1(0x3b7f0f8, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x0)
	/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd/util/editor/editoptions.go:237 +0xed2
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd/util/editor.(*EditOptions).Run(0xc420158400, 0x3a6c900, 0xc420239710)
	/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd/util/editor/editoptions.go:334 +0x731
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd.NewCmdEdit.func1(0xc420376480, 0xc420273ac0, 0x1, 0x1)
	/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd/edit.go:99 +0x15b
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).execute(0xc420376480, 0xc420273a50, 0x1, 0x1, 0xc420376480, 0xc420273a50)
	/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/spf13/cobra/command.go:603 +0x22b
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).ExecuteC(0xc420453b00, 0x8000101, 0x0, 0xffffffffffffffff)
	/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/spf13/cobra/command.go:689 +0x339
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).Execute(0xc420453b00, 0xc420239710, 0x3a46140)
	/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/spf13/cobra/command.go:648 +0x2b
k8s.io/kubernetes/cmd/kubectl/app.Run(0x0, 0x0)
	/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/cmd/kubectl/app/kubectl.go:39 +0xd5
main.main()
	/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/cmd/kubectl/kubectl.go:26 +0x22

```

I've also tried `kubectl edit ds`, and for the sake of experiment tried adding a Pod, then it failed rather gracefully with this message:
```
A copy of your changes has been stored to "/var/folders/zr/qjxvg8xn10nd06j2vflwtj880000gn/T/kubectl-edit-0133o.yaml"
error: no original object found for &unstructured.Unstructured{Object:map[string]interface {}{"apiVersion":"v1", "kind":"Pod", "metadata":map[string]interface {}{"namespace":"default"}}}
```
But when I tried to add a DaemonSet, it paniced.

I am not sure how we should fix, perhaps editing of lists isn't something a normal user is expected to do... Let's discuss.
